Text.Name: Item_Wood
Text.Desc: Timber of good quality, it is a common crafting material.

Text.Name: Item_HardWood
Text.Desc: Precious Goldwood that is a hundred years old, a very firm and heavy material.

Text.Name: Item_ParasolWood
Text.Desc: Divine wood which Phoenixes perch on, it has a smooth surface and an extremely firm texture rich in Qi. A very rare material.

Text.Name: Item_LingWood
Text.Desc: Wood that has been suffused with Qi, it is a very firm material and highly resistant to fire.
